name: Mission Neighborhood Testing Site (COVID-19)
description: Mission Neighborhood Health Center offers COVID-19 testing to Mission residents and community members. Call to check that they are still doing COVID setting at an alternative site. Eligibility: - You have at least one of the COVID symptoms. - You have been in close contact with a person who tested positive for COVID. How to Apply: - To schedule an appointment, call by phone during open hours. - You do not need medical insurance, a doctor's note, or Photo ID. If you are asked to show photo ID, yo
